attributes.description:
C200 AMG LINE.....Air-condition/heater, Bluetooth, USB/Aux 
Electric Window, Low mileage, spacious boot space, car stereo, display screen, mp3 interface, Central locking, alarm, AMG Wheels, Panoramic Sunroof, Keyless Entry / keyless Start, 360 camera to enable easy parking and easy reverse, Front & Rear Parking Sensors,

interior wooden trim, tinted privacy windows, Real double Exhaust, 
Boot Open sensor to enable easy boot open, easy boot close button, Shopping Basket
AMG interior Style. Run Flat Tires. Service Book Available With Full-Service History. 
Very Clean And Neat Car. Exterior General Metallic White & Black Trim.

Give us a call today for any queries and all your financial needs through all major banks.
This vehicle comes with a rwc, warranty and service plan on offer.
Call us today on 011 383 3083 or Lucky 072 088 8254
